mapper.insert: insert into utxo_output (tx_hash, out_index, value, lock_time, status, address, script) values (#{txHash,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{outIndex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{value,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{lockTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{script,jdbcType=VARBINARY})

insert into utxo_output (tx_hash, out_index, value, lock_time, status, address, script) values
(#{item.txHash,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.outIndex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.value,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.lockTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{item.address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.script,jdbcType=VARBINARY})
mapper.select: select a.type, a.create_time as createTime, b.* from transaction a join utxo_output b on a.`hash` = b.tx_hash
